column4: W: Couldn't stat source package list ftp://ftp.nerim.net testing/main Packages (/var/lib/apt/lists/ftp.nerim.net_debian-marillat_dists_testing_main_binary-amd64_Packages) - stat (2 No such file or directory)
i get this when i try to update
where can i go ask for help
i did apt-get upgrade and something failed
you don't add marillat and then update... you add marillat, get what you need from it (w32codecs and libdvdcss2 probably) and then you turn marillat off and update then
what did you want from marillat?
what are you trying to get off of marillat?
you added a repo to your sources.list... why did you add it?  what file did you need?
i did tell you that a second ago... anyways... just disable marillat... go into your sources.list and put a # next to ftp.nerim.whateverthehell
i don't care... just do what we are saying...
as i've said about 30 times... you need like 2-3 things from marillat... if you aren't wanting those... then turn it off... it breaks the upgrade function
